body.name: Rulism Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet, Brass Leak Free T-Valve & Adjustable Jet Spray, Feminine Hygiene, Baby Diaper Sprayer with Superior Complete Accessories
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 30 mins
features: 【High Quality】Our toilet bidet nozzles are made of 304 stainless steel with fine workmanship to improve durability and resistance to oxidation and corrosion, all edges are smooth enough to resist rust, durable and easy to clean. The EDPM tube and braided layer are added to the inner tube, which can effectively prevent hose explosion. Make the hose more durable and have a longer service life.

【Adjustable Water Pressure】By adjusting the water pressure of the bathroom sprinkler, you can change it from a jet spray to a soft spray to meet a variety of purposes. One key to control the water, tap to control the water pressure, the pressure can be adjusted according to the distance you press the class adjust.

【Multipurpose Sprayer】Handheld bidet sprayers are not only ideal for personal hygiene, they are also great for the whole family and can be used for pet cleaning, baby diaper sprays, muslin showers, women during pregnancy, floor cleaning and more. It is also ideal for elderly adults, anyone with limited mobility due to surgery, postpartum or injuries.

【Two Installation Methods】ON TOILET TANK INSTALLATION - Just hook bidet sprayer holder to your toilet tank, save your bathroom space and tools for drilling holes. WALL MOUNT INSTALLATION - Available to supply other multiple use according to your varies requirement, such as pet shower, car washer, flower sprayer, baby shower. Just ensure that the inlet diameter of your toilet water tank is 7/8 inches, and the toilet spray can be completed in just 5 minutes without any professional help.

【100% Money-Back Warranty】Sprayer with superior complete accessories, there is usually no lack of parts. We are committed to creating the best products and customer service, if you encounter any problem or need support for any reasons, please feel free to contact us and we will offer service within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So easy to install and use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install but you will need better plumbers tape to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely agree that the product is very much excellent and easy to fix myself with some home tools 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I won't get on my TP box and preach why cleaning with a bidet is better than using paper. That said, the new, black handheld bidet kit performs about the same as my previous silver-color one, but adds a bit of class.The black color is strikingly beautiful with its satiny finish.The kit consists of a spray head, delivery hose, a valve and various washers and fittings, instructions with drawings, and a wall holder that, thankfully, can be hung on the toilet tank. The kit is very complete, even containing a small roll of tape to seal the threads.To use, one would first turn on the valve installed under the toilet tank. Then, while aiming at the desired area, carefully pull back the lever, controlling the pressure as needed. When finished, turn off the valve and relieve the pressure in the hose by briefly operating the sprayer lever.Pros:-attractive black satin finish.-flexible hose with a protective metal sheath (sorry cats!).-complete kit with the necessary washers, etc.Cons:-nozzle head could be smoother.Opinion:I far and away prefer the handheld type of bidet over the toilet seat affair. This kit fills the need handsomely. Most people will find it easy to install. Just remember to shut off the water to the hose and sprayer head when finished using, AND relieve the pressure in the hose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product looks great! I need an extra tool to disassemble the original piece that connects to the water, but other than that, its great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to setup, easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: We use thos for everything now. Cleaning cloth diapers, cleaning buts, spraying down the shower, rinsing todler toilets. Has many uses honestly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After about four months of regular use, this flimsy unit failed and flooded my home. It has been used about once a day since I installed it. It randomly failed while I wasn’t even home. I used it in the morning, left for work several hours later and it started leaking badly while I was gone. It failed at the hose/handle junction after it had been sitting idle for several hours. I came home to a flooded bathroom and bedroom. The leaking spray was so strong that it blew a hole in the sheetrock behind the toilet.It seemed rather flimsy when I installed it. Turns out it is not well made, failed with average to light use and caused a bad flood in my home. I would NOT recommend this product. I would recommend spending a little more money for a better quality product. This one is junk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior Hygiene and Convenience in One Comprehensive Package
reviews.reviewText: The Rulism Handheld Bidet Sprayer has truly transformed my bathroom experience, and I couldn't be more satisfied. Its solid construction, featuring a brass leak-free T-valve, speaks volumes about its durability and reliability. The adjustable jet spray function is a game-changer, offering a personalized and comfortable cleansing experience.Perfect for feminine hygiene and baby diaper changes, this bidet sprayer comes with superior complete accessories that make installation a breeze. The thoughtful design and quality materials make it evident that Rulism prioritizes user convenience and satisfaction. The sprayer handle is ergonomic, ensuring a comfortable grip, and the controls are intuitive.What sets this bidet sprayer apart is its versatility. It goes beyond just personal hygiene – it's an eco-friendly option that reduces the need for excessive toilet paper usage. The spray is powerful yet gentle, providing a refreshing and effective cleansing experience.The inclusion of a comprehensive set of accessories makes it a complete package. The T-valve ensures a leak-free operation, and the entire setup exudes quality craftsmanship. If you're looking to enhance your bathroom hygiene routine, the Rulism Handheld Bidet Sprayer is an excellent investment that delivers on both performance and convenience. I wholeheartedly recommend it for its superior functionality and ease of use.
